misuses.description: The password is being stored in a map using a weak hashing algorithm, which can be easily cracked. It is recommended to use a stronger hashing algorithm such as bcrypt or scrypt.
misuses.recommendation: Use a stronger hashing algorithm to store the password.

misuses.description: The SecureRandom object is being used to generate a salt, but it is not properly configured. This can lead to the salt being predictable, which can compromise the security of the system. It is recommended to use a properly configured SecureRandom object, and to make sure that the salt is unpredictable.
misuses.recommendation: Use a properly configured SecureRandom object and ensure that the salt is unpredictable.

misuses.description: The PBEParameterSpec object is being used to specify the salt and iteration count for a password-based encryption, but it is not properly configured. This can lead to the salt being too small, or the iteration count being too small, which can compromise the security of the system. It is recommended to use a properly configured PBEParameterSpec object, and to make sure that the salt is large enough and the iteration count is high enough to prevent attacks.
misuses.recommendation: Use a properly configured PBEParameterSpec object and ensure that the salt is large enough and the iteration count is high enough to prevent attacks.
